description.menuItems: List of arrays containing at least 'label' and 'href' option 'icon' name as string.
description.parentType: Select the type of menu parents.
description.parentStyle: Select the style of menu parents (only applies when type equals button).
description.parentStyleColor: Select the color of the parent style. (only applies when type equals button).
description.childType: Select the type of menu children.
description.childStyle: Select the style of menu children. (only applies when type equals button).
description.childStyleColor: Select the color of the child style. (only applies when type equals button).
description.childStyleShape: Select the shape of the child style.
description.mobile: If true, the mega menu will be visible on mobile as well.
